Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Specimen Container(s): Polyester, rayon or nylon tipped swab placed in viral transport medium
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ProAdeno™ + Assay, a multiplex real-time PCR test for qualitative detection of human adenovirus DNA from NP swabs.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of human Adenovirus DNA from nasopharyngeal swab specimens of individuals with signs and symptoms of acute respiratory infection; aids in the diagnosis of HAdV infections in conjunction with other clinical and laboratory findings.
